Contact Gulf Harbour Today. A private member-owned country club community along Southwest Floridaâ€™s most stunning backdrop. Gulf Harbour is just minutes away from downtown Fort Myers, Sanibel and Captiva Island. Gulf Harbour Yacht & Country Club 14500 Vista River Drive Fort Myers, Florida 33908 (239) 433-5111 General Manager Lonnie Eberhard (239) 444-3621 lonnie@gulfharbour.com Membership and Communications Director Holly Trent (239) 444-3631 htrent@gulfharbour.com Food and Beverage Director/Sommelier Jesse Koeth (239) 444-3628 jkoeth@gulfharbour.com Questions or comments for the Gulf Harbour team? Events Calendar Re-employment Assistance Financial Aid Â» Unemployment Benefits Training and Education Financial Aid for Child Care 2-1-1 Texas/United Way HELPLINE For Employers Understand the Local Labor Market Â» Local Employment Statistics Gulf Coast Regional Data Quarterly Employment Reports by County Industry Special Reports Attract and Retain Talent Â» Recruit High-Quality Talent Consulting Services On The Job Training Resource Center Find a Career Office Main Navigation About Us Find a Career Office Â» Job Search Gulf Coast Workforce Board Members Planning & Measurement Leadership & Committees Related Resources A Study In Success Workforce Report Card Business Opportunities Get Information on RFPs and RFIs Â» Become a Vendor Support for External Grants Contact Information Home Administrative Staff Print Related Resources Gulf Coast Workforce Board Gulf Coast Workforce Board Members Meetings Planning & Measurement Leadership & Committees Workforce Report Card A Study In Success TAWB 2014 Education Paper See More Administrative Staff The Gulf Coast Workforce Board has designated the Houston-Galveston Area Council (H-GAC) to provide staff support for its functions. The experienced H-GAC staff provides planning, evaluation, fiscal, procurement, and management information systems services to administer the Board's projects in accordance with its goals. If you have any questions about Workforce Solutions or any of its projects, feel free to contact one of our staff. You can find us at H-GAC, 3555 Timmons Lane, Suite 120, Houston, Texas 77027. For inquiries, call us at 713-627-3200 or email CommunityEngagement@wrksolutions.com . Gulf Harbour Yacht and Country Club Membership Skip to the main content. CAREERS BLOG MEMBER LOGIN About Us Community Experience Fort Myers Clubhouse Transformation Lifestyle Amenities Golf Tennis Dining & Events Fitness Spa Island Membership Contact Us Toggle Menu Toggle Menu About Us Community Experience Fort Myers Clubhouse Transformation Lifestyle Amenities Golf Tennis Dining & Events Fitness Spa Island Membership Contact Us MEMBER LOGIN BLOG CAREERS Facebook Instagram Take the Next Step and Become Part of Our Family. Gulf Harbour Looks Forward to Welcoming You. Find the place where you belong at Gulf Harbour, Southwest Florida's premier private community. Three Ways to Get Started at Gulf Harbour Yacht & Country Club Inquire About Membership â†’ Inquire About a Tour â†’ Explore Membership Offerings and Pricing â†’ Build Lasting Friendships And Reconnect With Yourself. Our two membership categories, both golf and sports, offer something for everyone. Either option includes access for spouses or companions and unmarried children (up to age 23). Golf Membership Enjoy year-round golf, along with unlimited access to our driving range and practice facilities. As a member, you can participate in a variety of events and tournaments, and conveniently book tee times up to seven days in advance. Take advantage of our local club Reciprocal Program for added golfing opportunities to play other neighboring clubs. Beyond the links, members can indulge in social activities, waterfront dining and full access to our state-of-the-art Wellness Center, featuring a heated pool, saunas, steam rooms and a luxurious Day Spa. Our comprehensive tennis program offers another avenue for fitness and fun. Sports Membership Enjoy a vibrant lifestyle at Gulf Harbour with a Sports Membership. Take advantage of diverse and delicious dining options, including the fun and casual Waterside Grille. Participate in a full calendar of social events and activities. Our Wellness Center offers a range of amenities, from a heated pool to saunas, steam rooms, fitness classes and a full spa. Stay active with our inclusive tennis program. Gulf Harbour has the most active tennis program in Southwest Florida. And enjoy golf privileges from May through October. When Youâ€™re Ready, Weâ€™re Here. Contact Holly Trent, Membership Director , or complete form below , to learn more and schedule a personalized tour. And be sure to ask about our Ambassador Program and how it can make your introduction to Gulf Harbour informative and fun. Interested in learning more about a membership at the top private club in Fort Myers. Please fill out the form below or contact Holly Trent, Membership and Communications Director, (239) 444-3631, or htrent@gulfharbour.com . Contact Us Contact Us 14500 Vista River Drive Fort Myers, FL 33908 E: ghcc@gulfharbour.com P: 239-433-5111 Awards Awards Recent Blog Post Recent Blog Post Featured Blog Image Island Awakening: A Walk Through Nature, Wellness & Connection at Eagle Perch A Little Peace, Just Steps Away Sometimes, the most powerful moments happen when we pause. Gulf Harbour Yacht and Country Club - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQâ€™s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQâ€™s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Fort Myers Golf Communities Gulf Harbour Yacht and Country Club Gulf Harbour Yacht and Country Club is a private golf and yacht club in Fort Myers, Florida. The club is situated along the shores of the Caloosahatchee River. This luxury golf community in southwest Florida includes an 18- hole championship golf course with state-of-the-art practice facilities. Unlike many clubs, this club remains an equity club. In addition to golf, the community contains 186 slips in its deepwater basin and Marina. The marina will accommodate boats and yachts ranging in size from 30 feet to 100 feet. Finally, members also have access to the wellness center, heated pool, and tennis courts. In all, there are 1600 properties nestled within 22 unique neighborhoods spread across 547 acres. There is a wide variety of properties available including condos, villas, single family homes and luxury estate homes. Bottom Line The Naples Golf Guy Team specializes in helping buyers and sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida Golf Communities. Contact us today for more information. Location: Fort Myers Club Type: Private Membership Type: Up front initiation fee Real Estate Home Price Ranges Single Family: 	for Sale $685,000 â€“ $10,000,000 View Homes for Sale Condos: $250,000 â€“ $3,000,000 View Condos for Sale The Naples Golf Guy Team has more than 20 years of experience helping Buyers and Sellers with their real estate needs in Gulf Harbour. Call, text, or email us today for more information. Privacy & Cookie Policy Got It! Manage consent Close Privacy Overview This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience. Necessary Necessary Always Enabled Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. These cookies ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously. Cookie Duration Description cookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Analytics". cookielawinfo-checkbox-functional 11 months The cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Functional". cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookies is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Necessary". cookielawinfo-checkbox-others 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Other. cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Performance". viewed_cookie_policy 11 months The cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data. Functional Functional Functional cookies help to perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collect feedbacks, and other third-party features. Performance Performance Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors. Analytics Analytics Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc. Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with relevant ads and marketing campaigns. These cookies track visitors across websites and collect information to provide customized ads. Others Others Other uncategorized cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category as yet. SAVE & ACCEPT

CAREERS BLOG MEMBER LOGIN About Us Community Experience Fort Myers Clubhouse Transformation Lifestyle Amenities Golf Tennis Dining & Events Fitness Spa Island Membership Contact Us Toggle Menu Toggle Menu About Us Community Experience Fort Myers Clubhouse Transformation Lifestyle Amenities Golf Tennis Dining & Events Fitness Spa Island Membership Contact Us MEMBER LOGIN BLOG CAREERS Facebook Instagram Relax, Youâ€™re Among Friends. Unwind and Belong. Your Gulf Harbour Family is Ready to Welcome You. Find Your Place Here Finding the right place to settle down is a big decision as you consider relocating or retiring. The community you choose, the region, the activities, the amenities and the people youâ€™ll get to know at your new club are all major factors in your decision. At Gulf Harbour, we are a warm, welcoming and inviting community dedicated to helping new members and their families find their place here. Imagine Yourself Unwinding amidst inviting landscapes and stunning sunsets. Connecting with neighbors who share your passions. Indulging in world-class amenities, from a championship golf course to a new tennis complex, fitness center and luxurious spa treatments. Discover the Gulf Harbour Difference We invite you to browse the links below to learn more about our exceptional offerings and how your membership will foster a sense of belonging that becomes family. Contact Membership and Communications Director, Holly Trent, (239) 444-3631 or htrent@gulfharbour.com . About Our Club Skip to content Menu Home Our Club Mission Team Membership Schedules & Policies Heritage Club Events Calendar Event List Club Cruising Boaters Night Extended Cruises Lunch Bunches Apparel Store Marine Links Member Login Dashboard Boats Members Profile Scroll down to content About Our Club Commodore Kirk Penland The Gulf Harbour Yacht Club was formed in 1996 as a cruising and social club for boaters already living and/or having their boats moored in Gulf Harbour.Â  Located within the Gulf Harbour community, the Yacht Club is a separate entity from the Gulf Harbour Marina and the Gulf Harbour Country Club. The Gulf Harbour Yacht Club promotes the enjoyment, knowledge, and safety of boating through organized cruises and social functions.Â  Boating activities include extended cruises throughout Florida and monthly lunch cruises to various waterfront restaurants in the Ft. Myers area.Â  On the social front, club members meet monthly for a Boatersâ€™ Night and again for a dinner meeting. Membership is required. Club Events Please see Club Events Menu for the 2025 Calendar Contact Us Flag Officers: lpalmer@lauth.net Membership Director: beverlycsimmons@gmail.com GHYC Member Supplies *Name Tags: beverlycsimmons@gmail.com *GHYC Roster: beverlycsimmons@gmail.com *GHYC Burgees: beverlycsimmons@gmail.com *Blazer Patches: beverlycsimmons@gmail.com *Yacht Club of America Card (YCOA): Contact: elizabeth@eaminvestments.net *YCOA Member in Good Standing Letter: Contact: elizabeth@eaminvestments.net Please Remember!
